meanings.definition: A series of still images on a strip of film used for educational or entertainment purposes.
meanings.sent1: The teacher showed us filmstrips of animals in the wild.
meanings.sent2: We watched filmstrips about space exploration in science class.
meanings.sent3: The filmstrips of historical figures came to life on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her memories played out like filmstrips in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the filmstrips were so vibrant, it felt like we were there.

meanings.sent1: He carefully filmstrips the beautiful sunset at the beach.
meanings.sent2: She filmstrips every important moment of her life.
meanings.sent3: I filmstrips the hilarious antics of my pet cat.
meanings.sent4: The artist filmstrips the essence of nature in his paintings.
meanings.sent5: The photographer filmstrips the essence of the city in black and white.
